item.description:
PorcFest 2012 - The World's Biggest and Best Freedom Festival

Brought to you by the Free State Project: Liberty in Our Lifetime!

Whether you're already a Free State Project participant, simply considering it, or just want to have a good time with fellow pro-liberty activ...ists, PorcFest is a great event to attend!

Porcfest aims to help individuals visit NH and better acquaint them with the Free State Project. Learn more at http://freestateproject.org/

Porc-Fest is the abbreviated name given to the Free State Project's Porcupine Freedom Festival. It is the largest and most successful event the Free State Project puts on each year, and is 7 fun days of camping in northern NH, with plenty of events, sessions, speakers, games, etc

You dont want to miss it!!
item.name: Porcfest 2012, the Porcupine Freedom Festival
